resources.string: Did you know? We Are Losing 1.2 Trillion Tons of Ice Each Year
What does that mean?\nThe charging map will only show renewable/ surplus energy suppliers to make sure you reach your sustainability goals.
What does that mean?\nThe charging map will show all charging options and allow you to compensate your CO2- emissions.
What does that mean?\nThe charging map will show all charging options without being able to buy a green certificate.
Which CO2 fighter you you want to hire?
By choosing your CO2 fighter you’re contributing to renewable energy projects to compensate for not charging at 100% green ports.
